description: At least 10 die as oxygen used to treat the patients helps spread the fire in Piatra Neamt.
title: Covid: Romania hospital blaze kills at least 10 infected patients
title_page: Covid: Romania hospital blaze kills at least 10 infected patients - BBC News
maintext: Eight of the victims were reportedly killed in the room where the fire broke out on the second floor, and two others in a room next to it. All were said have been receiving treatment for coronavirus. Many in the ward were on ventilators.
